text.text:
The Star Wars saga has had a vast presence in video games since the 80s, with titles like "Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back" (1982) and "Star Wars" (1983), followed by "Star Wars: X-Wing" (1993) and "Star Wars: TIE Fighter" (1994). Other notable games from the 90s include "Star Wars: Dark Forces" (1995) and "Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire" (1996).
In the 2000s, acclaimed games like "Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic" (2003), "Star Wars: Battlefront" (2004), and "Star Wars: Republic Commando" (2005) were released. The saga continues to be a highly active IP in the realm of video games, with new releases for various platforms.

La saga de Star Wars ha tenido una vasta presencia en los videojuegos desde los años 80, con títulos como "Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back" (1982) y "Star Wars" (1983), seguidos por "Star Wars: X-Wing" (1993) y "Star Wars: TIE Fighter" (1994). Otros juegos destacados de los 90 incluyen "Star Wars: Dark Forces" (1995) y "Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire" (1996).
En la década de 2000, se lanzaron juegos aclamados como "Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic" (2003), "Star Wars: Battlefront" (2004) y "Star Wars: Republic Commando" (2005). La saga continua siendo hoy en dia una IP muy activa en el ámbito y lanzamiento de videojuegos para distinta plataformas.
